entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 5:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -34.8°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -38.8°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 34. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 51 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow late in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
